ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the mountains like tufts of coloured wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The mountains like the tufts of carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the mountains shall be like fluffs of carded wool in varying colours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and mountains will be like carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And mountains will be like flying wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the mountains will be like wool, carded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains shall be as loosened wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the mountains shall be like plucked wool-tufts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the mountains will become as carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the mount-ains like tufts of carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the mountains shall become as wool carded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains like carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains will be like carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains will be like carded wool,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the mountains like tufts of carded wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains will be like tufted wool.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [101:5] and the mountains will be like tufts of wool, like carded wool in terms of the lightness with which it floats [in the air] until it comes to settle upon the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And the mountains will become as carded wool.
